-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Tool to convert literate code between styles or to code.
--   
@package unlit
@version 0.2.0.1

module Unlit.String
unlit :: [Delim] -> String -> String
relit :: Style -> Style -> String -> String
type Style = [Delim]
all :: [Delim]
latex :: [Delim]
bird :: [Delim]
haskell :: [Delim]
markdown :: [Delim]
tildefence :: [Delim]
backtickfence :: [Delim]
type Lang = String
forLang :: Lang -> Style -> Style
instance Eq BeginEnd
instance Eq Delim
instance Show Delim

module Unlit.Text
unlit :: [Delim] -> Text -> Text
relit :: Style -> Style -> Text -> Text
type Style = [Delim]
all :: [Delim]
latex :: [Delim]
bird :: [Delim]
haskell :: [Delim]
markdown :: [Delim]
tildefence :: [Delim]
backtickfence :: [Delim]
type Lang = Text
forLang :: Lang -> Style -> Style
instance Eq BeginEnd
instance Eq Delim
instance Show Delim
